article: How to Turn On and Activate Find My iPhone on All Devices
intro: Find My iPhone is a feature that allows you to track down your device if it's ever misplaced, lost, or stolen. This wikiHow will show you how to enable Find My on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac computer.
